# uptimekuma_notification_octopush (Resource)

Octopush notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Octopush V2 API Example
resource "uptimekuma_notification_octopush" "example_v2" {
  name = "Octopush SMS V2"

  # API Version (1 for Direct Mail, 2 for standard API)
  version = "2"

  # V2 API Configuration
  api_key      = "your-api-key"
  login        = "your-login"
  phone_number = "+1234567890"
  sms_type     = "sms_premium" # or "sms_low_cost"
  sender_name  = "MyApp"

  # Optional: Enable or disable the notification
  is_active = true

  # Optional: Mark as default notification
  is_default = false

  # Optional: Apply to existing monitors
  apply_existing = false
}

# Octopush V1 (Direct Mail) API Example
resource "uptimekuma_notification_octopush" "example_v1" {
  name = "Octopush Direct Mail V1"

  # API Version
  version = "1"

  # V1 (Direct Mail) API Configuration
  dm_api_key      = "your-dm-api-key"
  dm_login        = "your-dm-login"
  dm_phone_number = "+1234567890"
  dm_sms_type     = "your-sms-type"
  dm_sender_name  = "MyApp"

  is_active = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) API key for Octopush V2 API authentication
- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `dm_api_key` (String, Sensitive) API key for Octopush V1 (Direct Mail) API
- `dm_login` (String, Sensitive) Login/username for Octopush V1 (Direct Mail) API
- `dm_phone_number` (String) Recipient phone number for Octopush V1 API
- `dm_sender_name` (String) Sender name for Octopush V1 API
- `dm_sms_type` (String) SMS type for Octopush V1 API
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `login` (String, Sensitive) Login/username for Octopush V2 API authentication
- `phone_number` (String) Recipient phone number for Octopush V2 API
- `sender_name` (String) Sender name for Octopush V2 API
- `sms_type` (String) SMS type for Octopush V2 API (e.g., "sms_premium", "sms_low_cost")
- `version` (String) Octopush API version ("1" for Direct Mail or "2" for standard API)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
